name: Shield Squad!
description:
You move around with the arrow keys or WASD, you go down a lot faster than you go anywhere else, which helps with catching up with missiles under you. 

This is my first game, and one I've loved working on the past little while. Right now it's very bare-bones, but  I plan on adding many more features, such as a rounds system that introduce new enemies in different combinations as you run through the game. I also want to add upgrades you get between the rounds that have unique effects, along side powerful temporary powerups you pick up within a round. Oh, and sound of course, I want the rockets and their explosions to make cool techno noises, and cool music eventually.
